properties.entry: SELECT (SELECT dc.created) AS cargoArrived, (SELECT sc.value FROM stringculture sc WHERE sc.id = (SELECT cp.name FROM cargo_producer cp WHERE cp.id = c.cargo_producer_id) AND sc.locale = :locale) AS cargoProducerName, (SELECT dc.cargo_receiver_name) AS cargoReceiverName, (SELECT dc.cargo_receiver_address) AS cargoReceiverAddress, (SELECT sc.value FROM stringculture sc WHERE sc.id = (SELECT ct.name FROM cargo_type ct WHERE ct.id = c.cargo_type_id) AND sc.locale= :locale) AS cargoTypeName, (SELECT ct.ukt_zed_code FROM cargo_type ct WHERE ct.id = c.cargo_type_id) AS cargoTypeCode, (SELECT c.`count`) AS `count`, (SELECT sc.value FROM stringculture sc WHERE sc.id = (SELECT ut.short_name FROM unit_type ut WHERE ut.id = c.unit_type_id) AND sc.locale= :locale) AS unitTypeName, (SELECT sc.value FROM stringculture sc WHERE sc.id = (SELECT mt.name FROM movement_type mt WHERE mt.id = dc.movement_type_id) AND sc.locale = :locale) AS movementTypeName FROM cargo c JOIN document_cargo dc ON (c.document_cargo_id = dc.id AND c.client_id = dc.client_id AND c.department_id = dc.department_id) WHERE ( (dc.department_id = :department) OR (dc.department_id IN (SELECT d3.id FROM department d3 WHERE d3.parent_id = :department)) OR (dc.department_id IN (SELECT d3.id FROM department d3 WHERE d3.parent_id IN (SELECT d2.id FROM department d2 WHERE d2.parent_id = :department))) ) AND dc.created >= :startDate AND dc.created <= :endDate ORDER BY {0} {1}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cargo c JOIN document_cargo dc ON (c.document_cargo_id = dc.id AND c.client_id = dc.client_id AND c.department_id = dc.department_id) WHERE ( (dc.department_id = :department) OR (dc.department_id IN (SELECT d3.id FROM department d3 WHERE d3.parent_id = :department)) OR (dc.department_id IN (SELECT d3.id FROM department d3 WHERE d3.parent_id IN (SELECT d2.id FROM department d2 WHERE d2.parent_id = :department))) ) AND dc.created >= :startDate AND dc.created <= :endDate
